Packages 
Package Description
com.google.gdata.util.common.base
Open source utilities designed by Google.
com.teamboid.twitterapi.auth
Provides classes for authenticating Twitter accounts, and getting Twitter that are logged in.
com.teamboid.twitterapi.client
Provides the main classes for interacting with Twitter, the Twitter interface being the most important.
com.teamboid.twitterapi.dm
Provides classes for direct messaging, Twitter's private messaging system.
com.teamboid.twitterapi.json
Contains a small open source JSON library, gotten from here.
com.teamboid.twitterapi.relationship
Provides classes for the results of friends/followers related methods, and for the relationship between two profiles.
com.teamboid.twitterapi.search
Provides classes for using Twitter's search API.
com.teamboid.twitterapi.status
Provides classes for anything related to Tweets, such as different timelines or updating the authenticated user's status.
com.teamboid.twitterapi.status.entity.hashtag
Provides entity classes, which are metadata for Status interfaces.
com.teamboid.twitterapi.status.entity.media
Provides entity classes, which are metadata for Status interfaces.
com.teamboid.twitterapi.status.entity.mention
Provides entity classes, which are metadata for Status interfaces.
com.teamboid.twitterapi.status.entity.url
Provides entity classes, which are metadata for Status interfaces.
com.teamboid.twitterapi.user
Provides the User class, objects representing a profile on Twitter.
com.teamboid.twitterapi.utilities
Provides various convenience methods used throughout the library.
oauth.signpost
OAuth Signpost, an open source OAuth library used for authenticating with Twitter.
oauth.signpost.basic  
oauth.signpost.commonshttp  
oauth.signpost.exception  
oauth.signpost.http  
oauth.signpost.signature  
org.apache.commons.codec
Interfaces and classes used by the various implementations in the sub-packages.
org.apache.commons.codec.binary
Base64, Base32, Binary, and Hexadecimal String encoding and decoding.
org.apache.commons.codec.digest
Simplifies common MessageDigest tasks.
org.apache.commons.codec.language
Language and phonetic encoders.
org.apache.commons.codec.language.bm  
org.apache.commons.codec.net
Network related encoding and decoding.
